item.title: My Panamanian Research Adventure
item.description: My Panamanian Adventure I write to you from the wonderful tropical country of Panama! This summer, I was accepted to an internship at the Smithsonian Tropical Research Institute in Gamboa, Panama, with the Angiletta Lab helping study thermal tolerance in Anolis due to climate change Iâ€™ll be in Panama until September 1st, 2019. Figure 1: The view from the Gamboa Rainforest Resort in Panama near the Smithsonian Tropical Research Institute.
